metadata.title: 5293-1 -- c3p0 vulnerability
metadata.description: Aaron Massey discovered that c3p0 could be made to crash when parsing certain input. An attacker able to modify the application's XML configuration file could cause a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo ua fix USN-5293-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libc3p0-java-doc - 0.9.1.2-10ubuntu0.21.10.1 libc3p0-java - 0.9.1.2-10ubuntu0.21.10.1 No subscription required
